Title: ShotSeeker
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Andy Callahan, Lucas O'Connor (executive story editor), Tony Camerino (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Sarah Shahi
Plot: Reese protects an NYPD analyst whose investigation into a software glitch has drawn the attention of Samaritan. Also, Reese and Fusco are threatened by an ally of Elias's, who is looking to avenge his friend's death.
